questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Signage and information

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A designated pool area

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The trees in the background
B) The water in the foreground
C) The sign with the word "POOL"
D) People swimming

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bench
C) The word "POOL" on a sign
D) A swimming pool

What does the sign in the photo indicate?
A) No swimming allowed
B) Pool in this area only
C) No diving
D) Lifeguard on duty

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Buildings
B) Trees and greenery
C) A beach
D) A playground

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A sandy beach
B) The sign with the word "POOL"
C) A group of people
D) A car

What is the relationship between the sign and the background?
A) The sign is directing people to the trees
B) The sign is indicating a pool area surrounded by trees
C) The sign is unrelated to the background
D) The sign is for a nearby playground

What is the primary color of the sign?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Brown
D) Green

What is the text color on the sign?
A) Black
B) White
C) Yellow
D) Red

What can be seen below the sign?
A) Grass
B) Water
C) Sand
D) Concrete

What is the condition of the sign?
A) Brand new
B) Slightly weathered
C) Completely damaged
D) Recently painted

How many words can be seen on the sign?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is directly behind the sign?
A) A fence
B) A building
C) Waterbody, Trees and foliage
D) A road

What kind of trees are in the background?
A) Palm trees
B) Pine trees
C) Deciduous trees
D) No trees

What is the visibility of the text on the sign?
A) Very clear
B) Slightly blurred
C) Completely unreadable
D) Partially obscured

What is the sign mounted on?
A) A wooden post
B) A metal pole
C) A concrete block
D) A brick wall

Is there any water visible in the photo?
A) Yes, in the foreground
B) No, there is no water
C) Yes, in the background
D) Yes, all over the photo

What is the likely audience for the sign?
A) Hikers
B) Swimmers
C) Shoppers
D) Drivers

What is the clarity of the photo?
A) Very clear
B) Slightly blurry
C) Very blurry
D) Dark and unclear

What is the direction of the light source in the photo?
A) From the left
B) From the right
C) From above
D) From below

What is the overall composition of the photo?
A) Balanced
B) Off-center
C) Crowded
D) Minimalist

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Straight-on
B) From above
C) From below
D) Side view

What is the most prominent feature in the photo?
A) The trees
B) The sign
C) The water
D) The sky

What is the likely color of the water visible in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Clear
D) Brown

What is the visibility of the sign?
A) Very visible
B) Partially visible
C) Hardly visible
D) Not visible
